presentationColumns.name: Dist Functional Amount
presentationColumns.description:
CASE WHEN "Line Item Type"   in ('FRT','XXOBJ_PP') THEN 
 "Unit Selling Price" 

ELSE 
CASE WHEN SIGN( "Unit Selling Price"  )=-1 THEN "Unit Selling Price" 
ELSE
EVALUATE('xxoe_utils_pkg.get_price_list_dist(%1,%2,%3)' AS DOUBLE,  "Line Id", "Unit List Price", "Lines"."Attribute4"  
) *  "Quantity" 
*(CASE WHEN    "Average Discount" =100 THEN 0 ELSE (100-"Average Discount"   )/100 END)
END

END
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:EBS.OE Order Lines Fact.Dist Functional Amount
